show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 76 Oliver Hanke, invested over 150M in sustainable agroforestry
subtitle: 76 Oliver Hanke, invested over 150M in sustainable agroforestry
summary:
A deep dive with Oliver Hanke of 12Tree into how they are making agroforestry investable for institutional investors.

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag. 
Other ways to support our work:
- Share the podcast
- Give a 5-star rating
- Or buy us a coffee… or a meal!
www.Ko-fi.com/regenerativeagriculture. 

-----------------------------------------------------------

Listen to Oliver Hanke, Chief Project Officer of 12Tree! In this podcast we discuss how 12Tree raised 200M from a German pension fund and has been investing most of it in the past three years in large scale sustainable agroforestry projects. We touch upon the fascinating world of aromatic cacao, organic coconuts, holistic thinking and reforestation. I hope you enjoy this longer form interview until the end as we unpack how to put trillions to work in trees!

Find all notes and links here:
www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/2020/03/20/oliver-hanke.
